items.sentence: I thought Tom wasn\'t allowed to have visitors.
You should tell Tom that Mary wants to do that.
You should tell Tom why you disagree with Mary.
You should trying selling your products online.
You should turn in your paper by next Saturday.
What we want to do next is check the oil level.
We reasoned with Tom until he changed his mind.
We told everyone that we were moving to Boston.
We took refuge from the storm in a nearby barn.
I couldn\'t make myself heard in the classroom.
